name: skylar ribbed crop top
notes:
the skylar crop top is the ultimate summer top for crochet beginners! using only half double crochets, this easy crochet camisole works up quickly and is easily customisable to fit any size or body type. with a ribbed body and cute braided tie straps, the skylar cami is a versatile and stylish addition to anyone’s wardrobe but the pattern is also extremely easy to alter. there are alteration instructions if you prefer longer tank tops over crop tops or if you’d like a more loose-fitting crochet singlet. 

this pattern is also accompanied by a video tutorial. 

sizes: xs(s, m, l, xl, 2xl, 3xl)

skill level: beginner

this pattern is written in english using us crochet terms. contains step-by-step instructions with pictures. 

check out more free crochet patterns [here][1]! 

sign up to my **[newsletter][2]** and never miss a new crochet pattern release!


  [1]: https://forthefrills.com
  [2]: https://view.flodesk.com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
